message.body: Hey girl, how are you? I miss you so bad on MDC!
I am hanging in there. A bit scared how time is quickly days are turning into months, yet I feel like Rob just passed away.
I really miss mdc and you. I am struggling to let myself do things that I know will put a smile on my face. I still have no desire to be happy

Aw girl ❤ it really hasn't been much time at all. One day when you feel ready MDC will be right where you left it (with rfr saying "when your boss asks if you've been drinking, you say have YOU been drinking"). it's different without you though! I think about you lots.
